body_html: I've tried this code on a Windows box with Nvidia GTX 1080ti on Windows Server 2016 using PyTorch 0.4.1. It takes nearly 0.1s. I don't have a Linux box with GPU. So I can't tell exactly where the problem is. It's actually very hard to debug such a complex network because there are actually so many related things. If you could find out which atom operation (like add, addmm or mul) is generally slower, then I think that we can look into it.
